item.description:
Party located at:

17 Hickory Hill Drive

Waterbury, CT 06708

 

For wine night, everyone should bring a bottle of wine (no boxed wine or 1.75MLs please) AND a pot luck dish, finger food, hors d'oeuvres or desert. Please indicate what food item you want to bring when you sign up. If you are coming by yourself or don't want to go in with someone just bring a bottle of wine that is $15 or more ( 750 ml) with your dish. Couples or groups can go in together on a bottle that is $30 or more depending on the quantity of people in the group, to ensure we have a good assortment of wines to taste. Get some different types of wine so we have a varied taste testing.

 

Reds - Malbec, Blends, Cabs, Merlot, Shiraz, Pinot Noir, etc

 

Whites - Sav Blanc, Chards, Reisling, Pinot Grigio, etc

 

Sign up ASAP, because I have to limit the size of the event to 30 spots, due to the small size of my house....

 

Please note: The address of this event will be sent out a few days before the event, along with detailed driving directions.
item.why: Don't miss this opportunity to celebrate Keith's "New Pad" and have a "Angel Reading" from Vanessa who is Nationally recognized - Please call Vanessa for an appointment that evening 203 783 1811 - she will charge $55.00 for a 30 minute reading.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "ANGELIC HOUSE WARMING - WINE PARTY" AT KEITHS "NEW PAD "
